title: Test Aircraft Details Display
steps: Step 1: Select an aircraft from the list
Step 2: Click on the selected aircraft to view its details
expected_result: Aircraft details, including type, registration number, and airline livery, are correctly displayed.

title: Test Historical Flight Data Accessibility
steps: Step 1: Navigate to the historical flight data section for an individual aircraft
Step 2: Select a specific time frame for analysis
expected_result: Historical flight data for the selected time frame is available and can be analyzed.

title: Test Accuracy of Aircraft Model and Registration
steps: Step 1: Choose an aircraft with known model and registration details
Step 2: Compare displayed details with official records
expected_result: The displayed aircraft model and registration match the official records.
